= Graphical Interface =

The Graphical interface is javascript based web site developed using [http://angularjs.org/ AngularJS] and running over a [http://nodejs.org/ Nodes.JS] server.

This graphical interface is designed to be used just *locally*. <font color=red>It is not designed to be used as a public server on Internet.</font> The *path* inputs in the interface are local paths following the normal Unix way.
